attributes.action: amend planning law that prevents gyms opening in large warehouses because councils hide behind PEZ laws.  It should be easier for gyms to get planning permission
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many planning applications for gyms get thrown out without proper reason because Councils hide behind planning laws regarding PEZs and other silly notions.  The government is trying to get more people into sport before 2012 Olympics and this contradictory action by Councils is hampering that effort.

Also the obesity and heart disease epidemic should mean that councils welcome gyms not go out of their way to prevent them opening.
